text: Calliope School of Legal Studies is a private law school situated beside Jammu-Akhnoor Highway, Gandhi Nagar in Jammu in the Indian union territory of Jammu and Kashmir. It offers undergraduate 3 years law courses, 5 Year Integrated LL.B. courses, approved by Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi and affiliated to University of Jammu. Calliope School of Legal Studies was established in 2005. ==References== Category:Educational institutions established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in India Category:Education in Jammu (city) Category:Law schools in Jammu and Kashmir
title: Calliope School of Legal Studies
